模块 com.example.demo

程序包 com.example.demo.Display

package com.example.demo.Display
  • 类
    类
    说明
    GameOverImage
    A custom class for displaying the "Game Over" image on the screen.
    HeartDisplay
    A class that manages the display of hearts in the game.
    ScoreBoard
    A class representing a ScoreBoard that displays the player's current kills and target kills.
    ShieldImage
    A class representing a shield image in the game.
    TargetLevel
    Represents the target hint message displayed to the player during the game level.
    WinImage
    This class represents the "You Win" image that appears when the player wins the game.
